title: Has the National Republican Army been established to protect black people from Ko Klux Klan?
subtitle: :: Reviewed accounts of the origin of the National Gun Association say that it was formed to help freed slaves defend themselves against racist attacks after the civil war.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The National Guns Assembly was formed for the express purpose of evicting Ko Klux Klan and helping liberated slaves defend themselves against racist attacks.
